description: This document describes a vocabulary for annotating descriptions of vocabularies with examples and usage notes.
label: VANN: A vocabulary for annotating vocabulary descriptions

preferredNamespacePrefix.description: The preferred namespace prefix to use when using terms from this vocabulary in an XML document.
preferredNamespacePrefix.label: Preferred Namespace Prefix

preferredNamespaceUri.description: The preferred namespace URI to use when using terms from this vocabulary in an XML document.
preferredNamespaceUri.label: Preferred Namespace Uri

changes.description: A reference to a resource that describes changes between this version of a vocabulary and the previous.
changes.label: Changes

example.description: A reference to a resource that provides an example of how this resource can be used.
example.label: Example

termGroup.description: A group of related terms in a vocabulary.
termGroup.label: Term Group

usageNote.description: A reference to a resource that provides information on how this resource is to be used.
usageNote.label: Usage Note
